Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the severity of the train crash by stating it as a "big train accident" when in reality it is footage from a 2016 train derailment.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the footage is not live and is instead from a previous incident.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that it is indeed live footage of a train crash in Bihar.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the viewers would interpret the footage as a recent train crash in Bihar, leading to a misleading understanding.
